short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will replace all images with white blanks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save ink! replace all images with blanks before printing.

Extension design to be quick to use. you get just a button, there isn't any customization.
Extension tries to replace all image with a blank, not remove them since this can cause layout issues.
You cannot select which image to replace.

#Limitations:
All extensions can work on web sites ONLY - The extension will NOT work on pdf files.
All extensions can't work on the Chrome web store.

#How to set up:
Press the puzzle icon near the address bar and then press the pin next to the extension.
